tags.name: Subscriptions
tags.description: Manage event subscriptions for O-RAN compliant notifications. Includes both O-RAN standard operations and extensions.

tags.name: Publishers
tags.description: Manage event publishers and their configurations. Extensions to O-RAN API for internal cluster management.

tags.name: Events
tags.description: Event publication and status notification endpoints. Includes current state retrieval and event creation.

tags.name: HealthCheck
tags.description: Health and status monitoring endpoints. Extensions to O-RAN API for service availability checking.

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Authentication and authorization using mTLS (mutual TLS) and OAuth 2.0 with OpenShift integration.
